description:
The purpose of this course is to introduce data science with practical assignments that can be solved in Excel, which is the tool most often used in the enterprise world. The topics and assignments have a focus on SAP data, which makes this course more interesting for professionals working with SAP tools.
 


                                            Syllabus
                        Spreadsheet advanced topicsHow to extract data from SAPExploratory data analysisClusteringClassification
title: Data Science Essentials for SAP
